Armenian Mnemonic keyboard
==============

Description
-----------
Armenian Mnemonic keyboard layout.

Links
-----
[https://github.com/dotland/mnemonic-kb-hy/blob/main/README.md](https://github.com/dotland/mnemonic-kb-hy/blob/main/README.md)

 * Web
